cards.title: Screech
setup: {ScreechTeam} starts the game 'El Screamo' side up.
Put Total Chaos into play, then shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: At the end of {ScreechTeam}'s turn, he deals the Hero Target with the highest HP 3 Sonic Damage. Then one player must discard a card.
cards.advanced: When {ScreechTeam} deals a Hero Character 3 or more Sonic damage, that player must discard a card.
flippedGameplay: At the start of each of {ScreechTeam}'s turns, the Hero Characters with the highest and lowest HP must discard 1 card.

openingLines.AeonGirlCharacter: Screech to Aeon Girl placeholder opening!
openingLines.DaybreakAeonGirlCharacter: Screech to Daybreak Aeon Girl placeholder opening!

cards.title: Total Chaos
body: At the end of {ScreechTeam}'s turn, destroy a Hero Ongoing, then {ScreechTeam} deals the Hero Target with the highest HP 1 Sonic damage and 1 Projectile damage.
Increase Damage dealt to Screech by other Villain Targets by 1.

cards.title: Earworm
body: At the end of {ScreechTeam}'s turn, {ScreechTeam} deals each Hero Target 1 Sonic Damage.

cards.title: Shout It Out
body: {ScreechTeam} deals the Hero Target with the highest HP X Sonic Damage, where X is equal to the number of Discord cards in play. Then {ScreechTeam} deals each other Hero Target 1 Projectile Damage.

cards.title: Shatter
body: Destroy a hero equipment card. Then {ScreechTeam} Deals all Targets in the play area the Equipment card was in 1 Sonic Damage and 1 Projectile Damage.

cards.title: Ring Their Ears
body: {ScreechTeam} deals the Hero Target with the second lowest HP 2 Sonic Damage. That Target then deals the Hero Target with the highest HP 3 Melee Damage.

cards.title: Scream of Anger
body: {ScreechTeam} deals the Non-Villain Target with the highest HP 3 Sonic Damage. If a Target takes damage this way, reduce Damage dealt by that Target by 1 until the start of {ScreechTeam}'s next turn.

cards.title: Maximum Decibels
body: Increase Sonic Damage dealt by Screech by 2.
At the end of {ScreechTeam}'s turn, if there are no other Discord cards in play, destroy this card.

cards.title: No Self Control
body: {ScreechTeam} deals himself 3 Irreducible Toxic Damage. Then {ScreechTeam} deals the {H - 2} Hero Targets with the highest HP 3 Sonic Damage each. Any Hero Characters Dealt Damage this way must Discard a Card.

cards.title: Maximum Disruption
body: Destroy 1 Environment Card, 1 Villain Ongoing, and 3 Hero Ongoings or Equipment Cards.
{ScreechTeam} deals each Hero Target 1 Projectile Damage.

cards.title: Lead 'Singer'
body: At the Start of {ScreechTeam}'s turn, he gains X HP, where X is equal to the number of Villain Character cards in play.
If a Villain Character deals damage to {ScreechTeam}, Destroy this card.

cards.title: Shake Their Nerves
body: Discard the top Card of each Deck.
{ScreechTeam} deals each Hero Target 1 Sonic Damage. Heroes dealt Damage this way cannot Draw cards until the start of {ScreechTeam}'s next turn.

cards.title: Rattle Their Brains
body: Each player must Discard 1 Card.
{ScreechTeam} deals each hero target 1 Sonic Damage. Any targets dealt damage this way then deals themselves 1 Psychic Damage.

cards.title: Turn It Up
body: The first time each turn that a Hero discards a card, {ScreechTeam} deals that Target 1 Irreducible Sonic Damage.

cards.title: Bring the Noise!
body: At the start of {ScreechTeam}'s turn, {ScreechTeam} deals himself 2 Irreducible Toxic Damage. Then reveal cards from his deck until a Discord card is revealed and put it into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into {ScreechTeam}'s deck.
